data.actual_result: For 70:30 split view the member list is completely blank, for 50:50 and 30:70 cut off.
data.expected_result: The member list should be displayed without any visual issues (being cut off, not shown, etc.)
data.short_description: [iPad only] Opening member list in Split View mode shows it blank or cut off
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel - Force close Discord (close it via the app switcher) - Go back to Discord - Open another app in split view mode (size doesn't matter) - Now swipe left to open the member list - Observe it
